name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠_DAY】ときのそら New Year’s Party 2026『Dreams in Motion』 [5NbNvtpj2-c]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performing the song 'Ke Sera Sora!' on stage.
MC section where Tokino Sora interacts with the audience, asking about their attendance and controlling penlight colors.

subtitles.original: おはよう こんにちはも ご挨拶
subtitles.english: Good morning, hello, and greetings too.

subtitles.original: ってあれ？ 嘘 もうこんな時間？
subtitles.english: Wait, huh? No way, is it already this time?

subtitles.original: 午後から予定あるのに
subtitles.english: I have plans starting in the afternoon,

subtitles.original: すぐに支度をしなきゃ
subtitles.english: I have to get ready right away.

subtitles.original: 行ってきます！
subtitles.english: I'm off!

subtitles.original: 慌てて飛び出して気付く
subtitles.english: I rush out in a panic and realize,

subtitles.original: こっちじゃない そこだと
subtitles.english: It's not this way, it's over there!

subtitles.original: 駆けて行きます
subtitles.english: I'm running there!

subtitles.original: トラブルばっか 転んで起きての
subtitles.english: It's nothing but trouble, falling down and getting up,

subtitles.original: 毎日です
subtitles.english: that's my everyday life.

subtitles.original: なんでも思い通りとか
subtitles.english: Having everything go exactly as planned,

subtitles.original: そんな美味しい話はないけど
subtitles.english: there's no such lucky story like that.

subtitles.original: 心の曇り空
subtitles.english: But the cloudy skies of my heart,

subtitles.original: 晴らす合言葉
subtitles.english: with a password to clear them up,

subtitles.original: 唱えて
subtitles.english: chant it out,

subtitles.original: ほら 快晴でしょ
subtitles.english: look, it's clear weather!

subtitles.original: ずっと！
subtitles.english: Always!

subtitles.original: みんなに届けたい
subtitles.english: I want to reach everyone,

subtitles.original: 歌もダンスも元気も
subtitles.english: my songs, my dance, and my energy!

subtitles.original: きっと同じ空の下
subtitles.english: Surely under the same sky,

subtitles.original: 笑顔も分け合えるよ
subtitles.english: we can share our smiles too.

subtitles.original: ちょっと疲れちゃう時も
subtitles.english: Even when you get a little tired,

subtitles.original: 涙が出そうな時も
subtitles.english: or when tears are about to fall,

subtitles.original: いつも魔法の言葉で 今日も
subtitles.english: always use the magic words, today too.

subtitles.original: ケセラセラだから
subtitles.english: Because it's Que Sera Sera,

subtitles.original: さあ 絆 奏でて
subtitles.english: come on, let's play the melody of our bond!

subtitles.original: High! High! High!...
subtitles.english: High! High! High!...

subtitles.original: みんな 今日も一日頑張ろう
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's do our best today too!

subtitles.original: カメラにマイクに よし準備OK
subtitles.english: Camera, mic, alright preparations OK!

subtitles.original: お水もちゃんとあるし
subtitles.english: I have my water too,

subtitles.original: 備えさえあれば憂いなし ね
subtitles.english: if you're prepared, there's no worry, right?

subtitles.original: それじゃ今日は何をしようかな
subtitles.english: So then, what shall we do today?

subtitles.original: お歌に雑談に あ ほらこれだね
subtitles.english: Singing, chatting... Ah, look, this is it!

subtitles.original: みんなと笑い飛ばせば
subtitles.english: If I laugh it off with everyone,

subtitles.original: また明日も晴れ渡る
subtitles.english: tomorrow will be clear and sunny again!

subtitles.original: よっしゃ！
subtitles.english: Alright!

subtitles.original: みんな声出して！
subtitles.english: Everyone, shout it out!

subtitles.original: ホッとため息こぼして
subtitles.english: Breathing a sigh of relief,

subtitles.original: ふと夜空を見上げたら
subtitles.english: when I suddenly looked up at the night sky,

subtitles.original: パッと満点の星たちが
subtitles.english: suddenly a perfect score of stars,

subtitles.original: キラキラ瞬いてた
subtitles.english: were twinkling brightly.

subtitles.original: ずっと！
subtitles.english: Forever!

subtitles.original: 追いかけ続けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep chasing after it,

subtitles.original: 今日より高い夢でも
subtitles.english: even if the dream is higher than today.

subtitles.original: もっと強く羽ばたいて
subtitles.english: Flapping my wings more strongly,

subtitles.original: 空まで駆けていくよ
subtitles.english: I will run all the way to the sky.

subtitles.original: そっと背中押すような
subtitles.english: Like gently pushing my back,

subtitles.original: 温もり見つけたから
subtitles.english: because I found that warmth.

subtitles.original: いつまでもそばにいるよ
subtitles.english: I will be by your side forever,

subtitles.original: 今日も！
subtitles.english: today!

subtitles.original: 明日も！
subtitles.english: and tomorrow!

subtitles.original: ずっと！
subtitles.english: Always!

subtitles.original: ケセラセラだから
subtitles.english: Because it's Que Sera Sera,

subtitles.original: さあ 絆 奏でて
subtitles.english: come on, let's play the melody of our bond!

subtitles.original: High! High! High!...
subtitles.english: High! High! High!...

subtitles.original: みんな... みんな...
subtitles.english: Everyone... Everyone...

subtitles.original: 新年！明けまして おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: 本日は お寒い中 ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming today in this cold weather.

subtitles.original: みんな来れた？
subtitles.english: Did you all make it here?

subtitles.original: あ 来れてるからいるのわかってる
subtitles.english: Ah, you're here so I know you made it.

subtitles.original: あの ちゃんと安全に来れましたか？
subtitles.english: Um, did you make it here safely?

subtitles.original: え 今回のソラパは
subtitles.english: So, this time's Sorapa is,

subtitles.original: 私のライブ史上 最大規模ということで
subtitles.english: the largest scale live performance in my history,

subtitles.original: すごいおっきな会場で
subtitles.english: at such a huge venue.

subtitles.original: あの ハッシュタグとかも見てたんだけど 「でっか！」って
subtitles.english: I was looking at the hashtags and people were saying "Huge!"

subtitles.original: 「でかいな すごいな」って書いてる人がいっぱいいて
subtitles.english: There were lots of people writing "It's huge, it's amazing".

subtitles.original: 私も「でかいな すごいな」って思いながら見てました
subtitles.english: I was also watching while thinking "It's huge, it's amazing".

subtitles.original: リハーサルの時は ここにいっぱいそらともさん来るねって言われて
subtitles.english: During rehearsal, I was told "lots of Soratomos will come here",

subtitles.original: え 誰もいないじゃん！
subtitles.english: and I was like "Eh, nobody's here!"

subtitles.original: 誰もいないよ！ 誰もいない！
subtitles.english: Nobody's here! Nobody's here!

subtitles.original: っていう会話をしながら
subtitles.english: While having that conversation,

subtitles.original: とても楽しくやっておりました
subtitles.english: we were doing it very happily.

subtitles.original: でもみんないるね！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: But everyone is here! Thank you!

subtitles.original: というわけで 今日初めてライブだよって人！
subtitles.english: So, who is here for their first live today?

subtitles.original: おお 結構いるね
subtitles.english: Oh, quite a few.

subtitles.original: じゃあ 現地自体初めてだよって人
subtitles.english: Then, who is at a venue for the first time?

subtitles.original: 結構いる！ ありがとう
subtitles.english: Quite a few! Thank you.

subtitles.original: じゃあ 頑張って あの手振るだけでいいからね
subtitles.english: Then, do your best... just waving your hand is fine.

subtitles.original: あの 女の子！
subtitles.english: Um... Girls!

subtitles.original: おお！ 声出してくれてありがとう 「きゃー」って聞こえた
subtitles.english: Oh! Thanks for shouting. I heard "Kyaa!".

subtitles.original: 可愛い！ 大好き！
subtitles.english: Cute! I love you!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: え これってペンライトとかできるのかな？
subtitles.english: Eh, can we do the penlight thing?

subtitles.original: あ できないのかな？
subtitles.english: Ah, maybe we can't?

subtitles.original: こちらの人 赤！
subtitles.english: People on this side, Red!

subtitles.original: こちらの人は 青！
subtitles.english: People on this side, Blue!

subtitles.original: 真ん中は 黄色！
subtitles.english: The middle is Yellow!
